alert.note: Alert for St. Clair (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 9:25PM CDT until May 10 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at Hannibal. Mississippi River at Mel Price LD. Mississippi River at Winfield. Mississippi River at Clarksville. Mississippi River at Louisiana. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at St. Louis. Mississippi River at Grafton. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at St. Louis. * WHEN...Until Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 31.9 feet, The entrance to the parking garage just north of Eads bridge begins flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 29.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 31.4 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday morning. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 7 pm Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Mississippi River St. Louis 30.0 29.3 31.4 30.7 29.5 28.3 26.8 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
